title: Greeting Card, 19th century
inscribed: Inscribed in plate, upper center: .ST. VALENTINE'S . DAY .; lower center: . FORGET . ME . NOT .
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of Jacob H. Schiff
description: Young girl in green winter coat lined with brown fur holding envelopes in her right hand. Border decorated with green and brown stylized rinceaux. Card is bordered by white fringe.

tombstone.epitaph:
Greeting Card, 19th century.
19th century. Chromolithograph. Museum purchase through gift of Jacob H. Schiff. 1949-37-22.
